Class ObserverPropertyTest

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.application.viewmodel.events.ObserverPropertyTest
public final class ObserverPropertyTest extends Object
JUnit 4 test suite for the ViewModel observer utilities Property<T> and ObservableList<T>.

Verifies listener notification semantics, conditional updates, multi-listener behavior, listener removal, and robustness in the presence of listener exceptions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ObserverPropertyTest()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    olist_addRemoveListeners()
    Verifies adding and removing listeners affects notification delivery.
    void
    olist_clear_notifiesOnlyIfWasNonEmpty()
    Ensures ObservableList#clear notifies only if the list was previously non-empty.
    void
    olist_multipleListeners_allAreCalled_evenIfOneThrows()
    Verifies multiple list listeners are invoked even if one throws.
    void
    olist_set_notifiesOnlyOnRealChange()
    Ensures ObservableList#set notifies listeners only when the snapshot content changes.
    void
    property_fireChange_notifiesWithSameValue()
    Ensures Property#fireChange() notifies listeners using the current value as both old and new.
    void
    property_multipleListeners_allAreCalled_evenIfOneThrows()
    Verifies multiple listeners are invoked even if one throws, and that exceptions from one listener do not prevent others.
    void
    property_removeListener_noFurtherNotifications()
    Verifies that removing a listener prevents further notifications.
    void
    property_setValue_alwaysNotifies_evenIfEqual()
    Ensures Property#setValue always notifies listeners, including when the new value equals the current value.
    void
    property_setValueIfChanged_notifiesOnlyWhenDifferent()
    Ensures Property#setValueIfChanged notifies listeners only when the value actually changes.
    void
    setUp()
    Initializes the property and observable list before each test.

    • property_setValueIfChanged_notifiesOnlyWhenDifferent

      public void property_setValueIfChanged_notifiesOnlyWhenDifferent()
      Ensures Property#setValueIfChanged notifies listeners only when the value actually changes.

    • property_fireChange_notifiesWithSameValue

      public void property_fireChange_notifiesWithSameValue()
      Ensures Property#fireChange() notifies listeners using the current value as both old and new.

      public void property_removeListener_noFurtherNotifications()
      Verifies that removing a listener prevents further notifications.

      public void property_multipleListeners_allAreCalled_evenIfOneThrows()
